Package
Description
at.htl.timetableGenerator
This package is the main package for the timetable generator tool.
at.htl.timetableGenerator.constrains
This package provides various constraints for generating timetables.

  • Uses of Constraint in at.htl.timetableGenerator.constrains

    Classes in at.htl.timetableGenerator.constrains that implement Constraint
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DoubleHourConstraint
    This class represents a double hour constraint in a timetable.
    class 
    NoMoreThanThreeInRowConstraint
    This class represents a constraint that ensures no more than three consecutive lessons of the same subject are scheduled in a row.
    class 
    NonePlacedBeforeConstraint
    This class represents a constraint in a timetable where no course is placed before the current one.
    class 
    RoomConstraint
    This class represents a teacher constraint in a timetable.
    class 
    TeacherConstraint
    This class represents a teacher constraint in a timetable.
